verses.verse: (A Song, a Psalm of David.) My heart <S%H3820><s%> is steadfast, <S%H3559><s%> O God; <S%H430><s%> I will sing, <S%H7891><s%> I will sing <S%H2167><s%> praises, <S%H2167><s%> even <S%H637><s%> with my soul. <S%H9202><s%>
Awake, <S%H5782><s%> harp <S%H5035><s%> and lyre; <S%H3658><s%> I will awaken <S%H5782><s%> the dawn! <S%H7837><s%>

I will give <S%H3034><s%> thanks <S%H3034><s%> to Thee, O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> among the peoples; <S%H5971><s%> And I will sing <S%H2167><s%> praises <S%H2167><s%> to Thee among the nations. <S%H3816><s%>
For Thy lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> is great <S%H1419><s%> above <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> the heavens; <S%H8064><s%> And Thy truth <S%H571><s%> [reaches] to the skies. <S%H7834><s%>
Be exalted, <S%H7311><s%> O God, <S%H430><s%> above <S%H5921><s%> the heavens, <S%H8064><s%> And Thy glory <S%H9202><s%> above <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>
That Thy beloved <S%H3039><s%> may be delivered, <S%H2502><s%> Save <S%H3467><s%> with Thy right <S%H3225><s%> hand, <S%H3225><s%> and answer <S%H6030><s%> me!

God <S%H430><s%> has spoken <S%H1696><s%> in His holiness: <S%H6944><s%> "I will exult, <S%H5937><s%> I will portion <S%H2505><s%> out Shechem, <S%H7927><s%> And measure <S%H4058><s%> out the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Succoth. <S%H5523><s%>
"Gilead <S%H1568><s%> is Mine, Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> is Mine; Ephraim <S%H669><s%> also is the helmet <S%H4581><s%> of My head; <S%H7218><s%> Judah <S%H3063><s%> is My scepter. <S%H2710><s%>

"Moab <S%H4124><s%> is My washbowl <S%H7366><s%>; <S%H5518><s%> Over <S%H5921><s%> Edom <S%H9000><s%> I shall throw <S%H7993><s%> My shoe; <S%H5275><s%> Over <S%H5921><s%> Philistia <S%H6429><s%> I will shout <S%H7321><s%> aloud. <S%H7321><s%>"
Who <S%H4310><s%> will bring <S%H2986><s%> me into the besieged <S%H4013><s%> city <S%H5892><s%>? Who <S%H4310><s%> will lead <S%H5148><s%> me to Edom <S%H9000><s%>?
Hast not Thou Thyself, O God, <S%H430><s%> rejected <S%H2186><s%> us? And wilt Thou not go <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> with our armies, <S%H6635><s%> O God <S%H430><s%>?
Oh give <S%H3051><s%> us help <S%H5833><s%> against <S%H4480><s%> the adversary, <S%H6862><s%> For deliverance <S%H8668><s%> by man <S%H120><s%> is in vain. <S%H7723><s%>
Through God <S%H430><s%> we shall do <S%H6213><s%> valiantly; <S%H2428><s%> And it is He who will tread <S%H947><s%> down <S%H947><s%> our adversaries. <S%H6862><s%>
